categories: Category:Desler Gizh Outworld Mobility Corporation products

nodes.text: The DS-4 was a model of landspeeder produced by Desler Gizh Outworld Mobility Corporation during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.
The Desler DS-4 was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in update 3.3.1 on September 1, 2015 as one of the items in the Wild Space Explorer's Pack on the Cartel Market.
